about.title: About {{- appName}}
about.errorWhenLookingForUpdates: An error has occurred when looking for updates

addServer.title: Add Server
addServer.message: Do you want to add "{{- host}}" to your list of servers?

addServerError.title: Invalid Host
addServerError.message: The host "{{- host}}" could not be validated, so was not added.

certificateError.title: Certificate error
certificateError.message: Do you trust certificate from "{{- issuerName}}"? Only click 'Yes' if you really trust this certificate. If you are unsure, contact your IT or security team before clicking on 'Yes'.

clearCache.title: Keep your login session?
clearCache.message: By deleting your login session you will be logged out and asked to inform your credentials again.

resetAppData.title: Reset app data
resetAppData.message: This will sign you out from all your teams and reset the app back to its original settings. This cannot be undone.

clearPermittedScreenCaptureServers.title: Clear Permitted Screen Capture Servers
clearPermittedScreenCaptureServers.message: This will clear all the permissions for screen capture servers, making them ask again for permission. This cannot be undone.

update.title: Update Available
update.message: A new version of the Rocket.Chat Desktop App is available!

updateDownloading.title: Downloading Update
updateDownloading.message: You will be notified when the update is ready to be installed

updateInstallLater.title: Installing Later
updateInstallLater.message: Update will be installed when you exit the app

updateSkip.title: Skip Update
updateSkip.message:
We will notify you when the next update is available
If you change your mind you can check for updates from the About menu.

openingExternalProtocol.title: Link with custom protocol
openingExternalProtocol.message: {{- protocol }} link requires an external application.
openingExternalProtocol.detail: The requested link is {{- url }} . Do you want to continue?
openingExternalProtocol.dontAskAgain: Always open these types of links in the associated app

allowVideoCallCaptureScreen.title: The video call is trying to capture your screen
allowVideoCallCaptureScreen.message: The video call is requesting permission to capture your screen.
allowVideoCallCaptureScreen.detail: The video call from the server {{- url }} requires permission in order to share your screen with others.
allowVideoCallCaptureScreen.dontAskAgain: Always allow video calls from this server to capture your screen

mediaPermission.title: Media Permission Required
mediaPermission.message: {{- permissionType}} access is currently disabled in your system settings.
mediaPermission.detail: To enable video calling features, please allow access in your system's privacy settings and then restart the application.

outlookCalendar.title: Outlook Calendar
outlookCalendar.encryptionUnavailable:
Your operational system don't support encryption.
Your credentials will be stored in plain text.

report.title: Report errors to developers
report.description: Report errors anonymously to the developers. Shared information include app version number, operating system type, server URL, device language and error type. No content or usernames are shared.
report.masDescription: This option is disabled when installed from the Mac App Store, the errors will be reported through the Mac App Store error report process.

flashFrame.title: Enable Flash Frame
flashFrame.description: Flashes the window to attract user's attention.
flashFrame.onLinux: Some Linux distros don't have support for this feature.
flashFrame.descriptionDarwin: Bounces the app icon in the dock to attract user's attention.

hardwareAcceleration.title: Hardware Acceleration
hardwareAcceleration.description: Enables the use of hardware acceleration when available. The application will reload on change.

internalVideoChatWindow.title: Open Video Chat in Application Window
internalVideoChatWindow.description: If enabled, the Video Chat will open in the application's window instead of the default browser. However, for Google Meet and Jitsi, screen recording is not supported in Electron applications, so they will always open in the browser regardless of this setting.
internalVideoChatWindow.masDescription: This option is disabled when installed from the Mac App Store. For security reasons, Video Chat will always open in the browser by default.

minimizeOnClose.title: Minimize on close
minimizeOnClose.description: When closed the app will be minimized, otherwise it will quit the application. Tray Icon need to be disabled to this take effect.

menubar.title: Menu bar
menubar.description: Show menu bar on the top of the window.

sidebar.title: Sidebar
sidebar.description: Show sidebar on the left of the window with the Server List, Downloads and Settings.

trayIcon.title: Tray Icon
trayIcon.description: Show tray icon on the system tray. If tray icon is active the app will be hidden to tray on close. Otherwise it will quit the application.

availableBrowsers.title: Default Browser
availableBrowsers.description: Choose which browser will open external links from this app. System Default uses your operating system settings.

clearPermittedScreenCaptureServers.title: Clear Screen Capture Permissions
clearPermittedScreenCaptureServers.description: Clear the screen capture permissions that was selected to not ask again on video calls.

allowScreenCaptureOnVideoCalls.title: Allow Screen Capture on Video Calls
allowScreenCaptureOnVideoCalls.description: Allow screen capture on video calls. This will ask for permission on each video call.

ntlmCredentials.title: NTLM Credentials
ntlmCredentials.description: Allow NTLM Credentials to be used when connecting to a server.
ntlmCredentials.domains: Domains that will use the credentials. Separated by comma. Use * to match all domains.

videoCallWindowPersistence.title: Remember video call window position
videoCallWindowPersistence.description: Save and restore the position and size of video call windows between sessions

error.differentCertificate:
Certificate is different from previous one.

 {{- detail}}
error.noValidServerFound: No valid server found at the URL

unsupportedServer.title: {{instanceDomain}} is running an unsupported version of Rocket.Chat
unsupportedServer.announcement: An admin needs to update the workspace to a supported version in order to reenable access from mobile and desktop apps.

selfxss.title: Stop!
selfxss.description: This is a browser feature intended for developers. If someone told you to copy-paste something here to enable a Rocket.Chat feature or "hack" someone's account, it is a scam and will give them access to your Rocket.Chat account.

tooltip.unreadMention: {{- appName}}: you have a unread mention/direct message
tooltip.unreadMention_plural: {{- appName}}: you have {{- count}} unread mentions/direct messages

stillRunning.title: {{- appName}} is still running
stillRunning.content: {{- appName }} is set to stay running in the system tray/notification area.

screenSharing.permissionRequired: Screen recording permission is required to share your screen.
screenSharing.permissionInstructions: Please enable it in your system preferences and try again.
screenSharing.title: Share your screen
